Race.SpecificTitle: Justice(s) of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward  8
Council Member at Large -- City of Slidell
Rd. Lighting Dist. No. 16 -- 2 Mills - PC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD LIGHTING DISTRICT NO. 16 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF PAYING UTILITY CHARGES FOR ROAD LIGHTING AND MAINTAINING AND OPERATING ROAD LIGHTING FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT WITHIN ROAD LIGHTING DISTRICT NO. 16, AS PROVIDED IN, AND SUBJECT TO, R.S. 48:1308.
Race.FullText: Shall Road Lighting District No. 16 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a two (2) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $37,250 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of paying utility charges for road lighting and maintaining and operating road lighting facilities and equipment within the District, all as provided in, and subject to, the provisions of R.S. 48:1308 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950 as amended?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Svc. Dist. No. 2 -- $17,500,000 Bond - BOC - 20 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE $17,500,000 OF 20 YEAR GENERAL OBLIGATION BONDS OF THE DISTRICT FOR THE PURPOSE OF CONSTRUCTING, ACQUIRING, EXTENDING AND IMPROVING A FULL SERVICE CANCER CENTER AND RELATED HEALTH CARE FACILITIES OF THE DISTRICT, AND ACQUIRING EQUIPMENT AND FURNISHINGS THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall St. Tammany Parish Hospital Service District No. 2 (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Seventeen Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($17,500,000), to run twenty (20) years from the date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding seven per centum (7%) per annum, for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, extending and improving a full service Cancer Center and related health care facilities of the District, and acquiring equipment and furnishings therefor, which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 2 -- 20.62 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  20.62 MILL, 10 YEAR TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR THE DISTRICT, INCLUDING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION AND PROVIDING SERVICES TO INJURED OR ILL PERSONS IN EMERGENCY SITUATIONS AS PERMITTED BY LAW.
Race.FullText: Shall the Fire Protection District No. 2, St. Tammany Parish, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a twenty and sixty-two hundredths (20.62) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,480,784 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and providing services to injured or ill persons in emergency situations as permitted by law?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation District No. 1 -- 3 Mill - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  20 YEAR, 3 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING OR OPERATING PARKS, PLAYGROUNDS, RECREATION CENTERS AND OTHER RECREATIONAL FACILITIES IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 1 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three (3) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $967,428 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating parks, playgrounds, recreation centers and other recreational facilities in the District, together with the necessary furnishings and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Waterworks District No. 2 -- $815,000 Bond - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
WATERWORKS DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
(BONDS)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE $815,000 OF 20 YEAR GENERAL OBLIGATION BONDS OF WATERWORKS DISTRICT NO. 2 OF THE PARISH OF ST. TAMMANY FOR THE PURPOSE OF CONSTRUCTING AND ACQUIRING EXTENSIONS AND IMPROVEMENTS TO THE WATERWORKS SYSTEM OF THE DISTRICT, INCLUDING FURNISHINGS, EQUIPMENT AND MACHINERY THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Waterworks District No. 2 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Eight Hundred Fifteen Thousand Dollars ($815,000) to run twenty (20) years from the date thereof, with interest at a rate or rates not exceeding seven per centum (7%) per annum, for the purpose of constructing and acquiring extensions and improvements to the waterworks system of the District, including furnishings, equipment and machinery therefor, title to which shall be in the public, which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and statutory authority supplemental thereto?
